title: Rock Creek Park: Fall Heritage Day
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Special Events and Festivals     Fall Heritage Day              Heritage Day         Flyer for 2015 Heritage Day    Rock Creek Park  and the Friends of Peirce Mill Present  Heritage Day   Fun, food, music and more! Saturday, September 10, 2015 10:00 a.m. - 4:00 p.m. 2401 Tilden Street, NW Step back in time to see the start of the Industrial Revolution with the machines and artisans of the mid-1820s that changed America. There will be 19th-century artisans on hand demonstrating blacksmithing, open-flame cooking, the apple cider press, and corn grinding.  10:30 a.m.  - 3:00 p.m. Dr. Stonestreet treats mill medical maladies   11:00 a.m. to 2:00 p.m. milling demonstrations and tours with Miller Jeanne and the Friends of Peirce Mill 12:00 - 2: 00 p.m. Bluegrass music by Kate Saylor and Notes from the Underground 12:00 p.m and 2:00 p.m. Walking tour and book signing by Steve Dryden, author of Peirce Mill: Two Hundred Years in the Nation's Capital. Children's hands-on activities
